about_the_game:
"Find My Wiener" is a whimsical journey through a vast hand-drawn world on a noble and peculiar quest: reuniting with your beloved wiener. But this isn't just any wiener—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt. Are you ready to answer the call of the wild and find your wiener?

Explore Vast Landscapes



Traverse through beautiful hand-drawn fields, with each blade of grass swaying in the wind, hiding secrets and perhaps your elongated wiener. The vast landscapes are filled with surprises that will keep you entertained and engaged.

Challenges and Achievements



Unlock numerous achievements, new difficulties, and more during your adventure! Discover new cosmetics for your wiener and other items to customize your experience. Challenge yourself to beat your personal best time in finding your wiener and earn many new Steam achievements as you progress.

Power-Ups and Debuffs



Seek out unique power-ups like eggplants, hotdogs, poop, and more to give your search a tantalizing twist! Beware of new debuffs that can be accidentally triggered, adding an extra layer of challenge. Encounter the unpredictable BlueBalls, which can send you flying into the air in a random direction.

Special Items and Explosive Fun



Unlock the Explosion skill, clearing all trees in the area and leaving a trail of fire for a short time. Look out for special relics via airdrops, it can remove the rain, providing unique advantages and helping you navigate tricky areas.

"Find My Wiener" is a whimsical journey through a vast hand-drawn world on a noble and peculiar quest: reuniting with your beloved wiener. But this isn't just any wiener—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt. Are you ready to answer the call of the wild and find your wiener?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Find My Wiener

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570, AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570, AMD FX-6350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 480 4GB

short_description: Embark on a whimsical journey through a vast and vibrant hand-drawn world to reunite with your beloved wiener. But this isn't just any wiener—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt.
